00023 size_t curl_data_callback(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream)
00024 {
00025     SrtmDownloader *downloader = static_cast<SrtmDownloader*>(stream);
00026     downloader->curlAddData(ptr, size*nmemb);
00027     return size*nmemb;
00028 }
00029 
00031 size_t curl_file_callback(char *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *stream)
00032 {
00033     QFile *file = static_cast<QFile *>(stream);
00034     int size_left = size * nmemb;
00035     while (size_left > 0) {
00036         int result = file->write(ptr, size_left);
00037         if (result == -1) {
00038             qCritical() << "Error while writing to file!" << file->errorString();
00039         } else {
00040             ptr += result;
00041             size_left -= result;
00042         }
00043     }
00044     return size*nmemb;
00045 }
00046 
00052 SrtmDownloader::SrtmDownloader(QString url, QString cachedir)
00053 {
00054     this->url = url;
00055     this->cachedir = cachedir+"/";
00056     regex.setPattern("<a href=\"([NS])(\\d{2})([EW])(\\d{3})\\.hgt\\.zip");
00057     QDir dir;
00058     if (!dir.exists(cachedir)) {
00059         dir.mkpath(cachedir);
00060     }
00061     curl = curl_easy_init();
00062     curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
00063     curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, 1); //Make sure error reporting works
00064     loadFileList();
00065 }
00066 
00068 void SrtmDownloader::curlAddData(void *ptr, int size)
00069 {
00070     curlData += QString::fromAscii(static_cast<char*>(ptr), size);
00071 }
00072 
00074 void SrtmDownloader::createFileList()
00075 {
00076     //Store data in memory
00077     curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, curl_data_callback);
00078     curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, this);
00079     
00080     QStringList continents;
00081     continents << "Africa" << "Australia" << "Eurasia" << "Islands" << "North_America" << "South_America";
00082     foreach (QString continent, continents) {
00083         qDebug() << "Downloading data from" << url+continent+"/";
00084         curlData.clear();
00085         curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_URL, QString(url+continent+"/").toAscii().constData());
00086         CURLcode error = curl_easy_perform(curl);
00087         if (error) {
00088             qCritical() << "Error downloading data for" << continent << "(" << curl_easy_strerror(error) << ")";
00089         }
00090         int index = -1;
00091         while ((index = curlData.indexOf(regex, index+1)) != -1) {
00092             int lat = regex.cap(2).toInt();
00093             int lon = regex.cap(4).toInt();
00094             if (regex.cap(1) == "S") {
00095                 lat = -lat;
00096             }
00097             if (regex.cap(3) == "W") {
00098                 lon = - lon;
00099             }
00100             //S00E000.hgt.zip
00101             //123456789012345 => 15 bytes long
00102             fileList[latLonToIndex(lat, lon)] = continent+"/"+regex.cap().right(15);
00103         }
00104     }
00105     curlData.clear(); //Free mem
00106 
00107     if (fileList.size() != SRTM_FILE_COUNT) {
00108         qCritical() << "Could not download complete list of tiles from SRTM server. Got" << fileList.size() << "tiles but" << SRTM_FILE_COUNT << "were expected.";
00109         exit(1);
00110     }
00111     
00112     QFile file(cachedir+"filelist");
00113     if (!file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly)) {
00114         qCritical() << "Could not open file" << cachedir+"filelist";
00115         //Not a fatal error. We just can't cache the list.
00116         return;
00117     }
00118     QDataStream stream(&file);
00119     stream << fileList;
00120     file.close();
00121 }
00122 
00124 void SrtmDownloader::loadFileList()
00125 {
00126     QFile file(cachedir+"filelist");
00127     if (!file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) {
00128         createFileList();
00129         return;
00130     }
00131     QDataStream stream(&file);
00132     stream >> fileList;
00133     file.close();
00134     if (fileList.size() != SRTM_FILE_COUNT) {
00135         createFileList();
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00144 SrtmTile *SrtmDownloader::getTile(float lat, float lon)
00145 {
00146     int intlat = int(floor(lat)), intlon = int(floor(lon));
00147     int index = latLonToIndex(intlat, intlon);
00148     SrtmTile *tile = tileCache[index];
00149 
00150     if (tile) return tile;
00151 
00152     if (fileList.contains(index)) {
00153         QStringList splitted = fileList[index].split("/", QString::SkipEmptyParts);
00154         if (!QFile(cachedir + splitted[1]).exists()) {
00155             downloadTile(fileList[index]);
00156         }
00157         tile = new SrtmTile(cachedir + splitted[1], intlat, intlon);
00158         tileCache.insert(index, tile);
00159         Q_ASSERT(tileCache[index] != 0);
00160         return tile;
00161     } else {
00162        return &errorTile;
00163     }
00164 }
00165 
00169 void SrtmDownloader::downloadTile(QString filename)
00170 {
00171     qDebug() << "Downloading" << filename;
00172     QStringList splitted = filename.split("/", QString::SkipEmptyParts);
00173     
00174     QFile file(cachedir+splitted[1]);
00175     if (!file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly)) {
00176         qCritical() << "Could not create file" << cachedir+splitted[1];
00177         return;
00178     }
00179     curlData.clear();
00180     curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_URL, QString(url+filename).toAscii().constData());
00181     curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, curl_file_callback);
00182     curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, &file);
00183     CURLcode error;
00184     if ((error = curl_easy_perform(curl))) {
00185         qCritical() << "Could not download" << filename << "("<< curl_easy_strerror(error) << ")";
00186     }
00187     //File is closed automatically
00188 }
00189 
00191 float SrtmDownloader::getAltitudeFromLatLon(float lat, float lon)
00192 {
00193     SrtmTile *tile = getTile(lat, lon);
00194     if (tile)
00195         return tile->getAltitudeFromLatLon(lat, lon);
00196     else
00197         return SRTM_DATA_VOID;
00198 }
00199 
00203 SrtmTile::SrtmTile(QString filename, int lat, int lon)
00204 {
00205     this->lat = lat;
00206     this->lon = lon;
00207     valid = false;
00208     if (filename == "error") return;
00209     buffer = 0;
00210     size = SrtmZipFile::getData(filename, &buffer);
00211     Q_ASSERT(size == 1201 || size == 3601);
00212     Q_ASSERT(buffer != 0);
00213     valid = true;
00214 }
00215 
00217 SrtmTile::~SrtmTile()
00218 {
00219     if (buffer) delete buffer;
00220 }
00221 
00226 int SrtmTile::getPixelValue(int x, int y)
00227 {
00228     Q_ASSERT(x >= 0 && x < size && y >= 0 && y < size);
00229     int offset = x + size * (size - y - 1);
00230     qint16 value;
00231     value = qFromBigEndian(buffer[offset]);
00232     return value;
00233 }
00234 
00236 float SrtmTile::getAltitudeFromLatLon(float lat, float lon)
00237 {
00238     if (!valid) return SRTM_DATA_VOID;
00239     lat -= this->lat;
00240     lon -= this->lon;
00241     Q_ASSERT(lat >= 0.0 && lat < 1.0 && lon >= 0.0 && lon < 1.0);
00242     float x = lon * (size - 1);
00243     float y = lat * (size - 1);
00244     /* Variable names:
00245         valueXY with X,Y as offset from calculated value, _ for average
00246     */
00247     float value00 = getPixelValue(x, y);
00248     float value10 = getPixelValue(x+1, y);
00249     float value01 = getPixelValue(x, y+1);
00250     float value11 = getPixelValue(x+1, y+1);
00251     float value_0 = avg(value00, value10, x-int(x));
00252     float value_1 = avg(value01, value11, x-int(x));
00253     float value__ = avg(value_0, value_1, y-int(y));
00254     return value__;
00255 }
